title: Cassidy Hubbarth
description: Katie & Cassidy Hubbarth talk about the ways the pandemic has changed NBA coverage, the complicated relationship between your job and your life, uncomfortable moments in sideline reporting, and how much allergies suck.
itunes:author: ESPN, Katie Nolan
itunes:subtitle: Katie & Cassidy Hubbarth talk about working in the pandemic, allergies & more
itunes:summary: Katie & Cassidy Hubbarth talk about the ways the pandemic has changed NBA coverage, the complicated relationship between your job and your life, uncomfortable moments in sideline reporting, and how much allergies suck.
